records.location_details: A white fiberglass boat with over 30 migrants was detected by Frontex aerial surveillance, initially in the Libyan SRR, then updated to the Maltese SRR. A Libyan vessel performed the rescue, during which violence against migrants was observed.
records.where_clear: Maltese Search and Rescue Region (SRR), near Libyan SRR
records.location_text_raw: inside the Libyan Search and Rescue Region (SRR)
records.uncertainty_note: The exact point within the SRR is not specified, only that it was within the Maltese SRR after initially being reported in the Libyan SRR.
records.context_note: Frontex unmanned aerial aircraft detected a migrant boat, initially in Libyan SRR, then updated to Maltese SRR. A Libyan vessel performed a rescue, during which violence against two migrants by at least three crew members was observed.
records.evidence_quote: Frontex unmanned aerial aircraft detected a white fiberglass boat with over 30 migrants onboard, inside the Libyan Search and Rescue Region (SRR) according to initial estimates. [...] Frontex surveillance aircraft updated the position of the boat in the Maltese SRR and reported a Libyan vessel performing the rescue of the migrants. Frontex surveillance aircraft observed [...] instances of violence against two (2) migrants by at least three (3) crew members of the Libyan vessel
